page.title: 07FAMILY LIFE CONTINUED
page.content: On both days the weather was fine and sunny though this has been the wettest June for 20 odd years. We came to the conclusion that although Ansley has a fair sprinkling of people from other parts of the country most people have lived in, or near Ansley, for most of their lives. People who said their family had always lived in the village, said they themselves had lived there from 3 to 257 years.I find the 3 years somewhat disconcerting.Perhaps the pupils didn't fill in the correct side?
